Type.Name: TabArray

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TabArray extends GLib.Opaque

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: an object containing an array of tab stops.
Docs.remarks: Each tab stop has an alignment and a position.

remarks.para: This is an internal constructor, and should not be used by user code.

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 initial_size, bool positions_in_pixels) cil managed

Docs.param: Initial number of tab stops to allocate, can be 0
if the tab positions are in pixel units
Docs.summary: an object containing an array of tab stops
Docs.remarks: Creates a new with the number of tab stops specified by . If is , the tab stop positions are specified in pixel units otherwise in pango units. All tab stops are initially at position 0.
